word:
And "while we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen," we shall prove it true that "our light affliction, which is but for a moment, worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory" (2 Corinthians 4:17, 18) (Testimonies, vol. 5, pp. 744, 745). 
                                                                           252
